title: New conflict data show that 2014 was a very violent year (Uppsala universitet)
text: ( Source : Uppsala universitet ) Press release Published 2015-10-12 In June, Uppsala Conflict Data Program ( UCDP ) reported that the number of fatalities in armed conflict has increased substantially in recent years, and that 2014 was the most
